verbose_text: Modified gastric bypass surgery began to be used in T2DM patients in the 1990s, and the efficiency of this procedure to cure obese patients with T2DM is between 86.6 and 91% [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR]; previous research showed that 83%-86% of T2DM patients maintained normal levels of blood glucose following operation [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
